name: analysis_club
description: Audio sample analysis: duration, tempo, beat grid. For running over heavenfalls.mp3 or any sample.

elements.name: Over an analyzed sample
elements.description: Load file â†’ duration + sr; optional tempo/beat grid. Timeline from file.

elements.name: Duration (required)
elements.description: duration_sec = num_samples / sr. length_beats = duration_sec * (tempo/60); tempo from user fixation.

elements.name: Tempo analysis (optional)
elements.description: User provides proper fixation on tempo. Optional: estimate BPM from onset/oscillator or librosa/aubio.

elements.name: Beat detection (math, in-repo)
elements.description: Harmonic oscillator matching, onset strength, adversarial branches.

elements.name: librosa beat_track (external)
elements.description: Python: tempo, beats = librosa.beat.beat_track(y, sr). Optional tempo estimation.

elements.name: librosa Beat and tempo (docs)
elements.description: Beat tracking overview and time-varying tempo.

elements.name: aubio (external)
elements.description: Tempo/beat detection; CLI: aubio tempo file.wav. Python bindings.

elements.name: soundfile (external)
elements.description: Read/write WAV, FLAC, OGG (no MP3). PCM + sr for analysis.

elements.name: pydub MP3 (external)
elements.description: Load MP3: AudioSegment.from_mp3(path). Export to WAV for soundfile if needed.

elements.name: heavenfalls.mp3 (sample)
elements.description: Project sample for analyzed-file timeline. Load via pydub or decode to WAV; analyze duration; tempo from user fixation.
